Hacking occupational therapy tools

10 JUN 2018 • 2 mins read

Cupidatat 90’s lo-fi authentic try-hard

Modifying occupational therapy exercises so the devices can be tracked to monitor activities.

Interviews with in-house occupational therapists and observations to understand their normal workflow. Created User Journey from insights gathered and design the UX of the platform accordingly.
